thread.title: BREAKING: Juncker says he WON'T run again for EC President as he admits to Brexit division
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Juncker says he WON'T run again for EC President as he admits to Brexit division

title: BREAKING: Juncker says he WON'T run again for EC President as he admits to Brexit division
text:
BREAKING: Juncker says he WON'T run again for EC President as he admits to Brexit division BREAKING: Juncker says he WON'T run again for EC President as he admits to Brexit division JEAN-Claude Juncker has revealed today that he WON'T stand again for the European Commission (EC) presidency. PUBLISHED: 15:05,  36, Sat, Feb 11, 2017 
Mr Juncker, who has held the position since 2014 said that he will “not run again” in an interview with the German World Service. 
Mr Juncker added that he doubted the EU could maintain unity after Britain leaves the union. 
More to follow... EPA European Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker 
He added that he had “fallen back in love with Europe, because I rediscovered the wealth of colours of the European Unio”. 
The EU mandarin also noted that “there was a lack of basic agreement about things that have to be carried out in Europe”. EPA Jean-Claude Juncker will not stand again for European Commission President Juncker's many signs of affection Wed, January 18, 2017 Jean-Claude Juncker is a Luxembourgish politician. Since 2014, Juncker has been President of the European Commission, which is the European Union Executive Branch.
